mechanical_dispersion_details: Agitated with milkshake-style mixer in ~ 400 mL of liquid for 5 minutes
Shaken on orbital-style lab shaker for >= 8 hours
agitated with ultrasonic probe in 15 minute increments; fines poured off after each interval and ~200 mL of new deionized water added
agitated with ultrasonic probe for 30 min (Duiker lab; pre-polishing)
agitated with ultrasonic probe for 30 min (Duiker lab; post-polishing)
